!Grand Master Xenos: The *gaze of the abyss* is a token given to those who have passed the Test of the Palus Knight. The Test of the Palus Knight is conducted by *Master Virgil* of the Dark Elven Guild in the *town of Gludio*. Seek him out to take the test. The town of Gludio is to the east of here.
